mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CREPORT VALUES( SEQ_CREPORT.NEXTVAL, #{creporter}, #{crreason}, #{csubject}, #{ccontent}, #{crespondent}, default, #{cno})
INSERT INTO RREPORT VALUES( SEQ_RREPORT.NEXTVAL, #{rreporter}, #{rrreason}, #{rcontent}, #{rrespondent}, default, #{cno}, #{rno})
mapper.select: SELECT CRNO, CNO, CR.CCONTENT, CRESPONDENT, CREPORTER, CRREASON, CRDATE FROM CREPORT CR JOIN COMMUNITY USING (CNO) ORDER BY CRDATE DESC
SELECT RRNO, RNO, CNO, RR.RCONTENT, RRESPONDENT, RREPORTER, RRREASON, RRDATE FROM RREPORT RR JOIN COMMUNITY C USING (CNO) ORDER BY RRDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACREPORT VALUES(#{crno}, #{creporter}, #{crreason}, default, #{ccontent}, #{crespondent}, #{crdate}, #{cstatus}, #{creason}, default)

INSERT INTO ACREPORT(CRNO, CREPORTER, CRREASON, CCONTENT, CRESPONDENT, CRDATE, CSTATUS, CREASON) SELECT CRNO, CREPORTER, CRREASON, CCONTENT, CRESPONDENT, CRDATE, 'accept', #{creason} FROM CREPORT WHERE CNO = #{cno}

INSERT INTO ARREPORT(rrno, rreporter, rrreason, rcontent, rrespondent, rrdate, rstatus, rreason, arrdate) VALUES(#{rrno}, #{rreporter}, #{rrreason}, #{rcontent}, #{rrespondent}, #{rrdate}, #{rstatus}, #{rreason}, default)

INSERT INTO ARREPORT(RRNO, RREPORTER, RRREASON, RCONTENT, RRESPONDENT, RRDATE, RSTATUS, RREASON) SELECT RRNO, RREPORTER, RRREASON, RCONTENT, RRESPONDENT, RRDATE, 'accept', #{rreason} FROM RREPORT WHERE RNO = #{rno}
